title: Trump Hotels Lease Violation ‘Action Alert’
subtitle: A viral "action alert" advises citizens to flood a federal agency's inbox in order to initiate an investigation into a Trump Hotels lease in Washington, D.C.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Citizens can prompt an investigation into Donald Trump's leasing of Washington, D.C. structure used as a hotel by e-mailing the General Services Administration (GSA), which is tallying messages.
